title: IMS LD-Based Mobile Microlearning Mathematics Activity Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Operations and Understanding of Mathematical Symbols
context.additional_context: Design of daily life-integrated mathematics learning activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners improve foundational computational skills by completing over 80% of 20+ structured mathematics activities designed based on IMS LD
Learners independently solve mathematics problems at least three times per week through activity-based learning modules provided in mobile environments
Learners receive individualized feedback via a monitoring system and achieve over 70 points in the summative evaluation at the end of the 6-month course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
